author: National Geographic
description:
Sound Bites
The 360 team investigates sound conditioned responses in sharks and how these may result in an attack. 

Perfect Storm
The team investigates three shocking attacks that put a shark’s relationship with the weather under the microscope.  

Blind Rage
The team investigates attacks with one thing in common. Using their cutting edge VFX lab they ask if color can trigger sharks to attack?  

Troubled Waters
The team investigate Sydney’s first fatal attack in 60-years. Could climate patterns be the key to the understanding this tragic event? 

Wrong Place, Wrong Time
The team investigate two identical attacks from Florida. Using the latest research, they uncover the surprising connection between these two attacks. 

Born Wild
The team investigates multiple attacks committed by the same species: the great white. Using the latest research, they learn why these shark’s bite.  

When Sharks Attack 360 | S1, E1-6

➡ Watch Sharks Up Close with Bertie Gregory here on Disney+: https://ww
title: When Sharks Attack 360: Perfect Storms & Wild Weather | MEGA EPISODE | National Geographic
